fixes.name: Sheet1 - Value
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau INT(NULL) to DAX BLANK() to preserve the null/empty value at row level. Created as a calculated column because the expression is row-level.

fixes.name: Delta Down T
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau calculated field [Delta Down T] which maps directly to the DELTA_DOWN column into a row-level calculated column referencing the underlying column.

fixes.name: Delta Down T USD
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau multiplication of calculated field and column ([Delta Down T]*[TO_USD]) to a row-level DAX expression using table-qualified column references.

fixes.name: Fix Value T
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ZN([Sheet1 - Value]) to DAX COALESCE([Sheet1 - Value], 0). Created as a calculated column because this is row-level null-coalescing logic.

fixes.name: Delta Down T USD Fix
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau row-level addition ([Delta Down T USD] + [Fix Value T]) to a DAX calculated column summing the two row-level calculated columns.
